location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a communication (not present) from Lieutenant Livingston, which instructed the Resident to deliver guns, small arms and other articles to the Governor of Bushire. It further notes that gun lascars from India will be retained for the time being, while it explains that two drill artillery sergeants are not needed and will be returned as soon as possible.
